title: To Combat Ebola Outbreak, Health Officials Call For 'Drastic' Action
teaser: The World Health Organization is wrapping up an emergency meeting with officials in West Africa about the Ebola virus. Local health ministries are saying they don't have enough funds to help contain what is now the largest and deadliest Ebola outbreak on record.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
